# Line by Tester genetic design
Code for genetic designs LineByTester

### Description

Function to compute the Lline by Tester genetic design

### Usage

```{r eval=F}
lineXtesterM(replications,lines,testers,y,name.y)
```
### Arguments

```
replication : column of replication values
lines       : column of 
testers     : column of the female values
y           : response variable
name.y      : response variable name

```

### Example

```{r eval=F}
# Run the function.
lineXtesterM(replications,lines,testers,TTWP,"TTWP")
```
